name: Create a responsible record in Salesforce from a custom webhook
description: Streamline your lead management process by integrating custom webhooks with Salesforce. This template allows you to automatically create a responsible record in Salesforce every time a custom webhook is triggered. Enhance your data collection and ensure that every lead is promptly recorded, improving your team's efficiency and response time. Perfect for businesses looking to automate their workflows and maintain accurate records in Salesforce.
